acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited by the Madison Court House clerk prior to 1938.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Miscellaneous business records including a grist mill record kept by Charles W. Swan, a tanner's journal, and a daybook of general merchandise accounts.
